title: Furnished Apartments Available, Beach Volleyball Court, Fitness Center
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '0', 'Bathrooms:', '0.5', 'Square Feet:', '268', 'Address:', '9500 Zelzah Avenue', 'Our community is in the City of Los Angeles, located in the San Fernando Valley region.', 'The Meridian Pointe neighborhood is home to California State University, Northridge (CSUN), the Northridge Fashion Center, and a diverse selection of popular Los Angeles shopping and dining.', 'Our property has state-of-the-art amenities that make living at Meridian Pointe convenient.', 'All our residents have access to our large sparkling swimming pool and spa, lounge area, conference rooms, and study areas.', 'We have a fully-equipped fitness center with free weights, on-site laundry rooms, vending machines, and BBQ/picnic areas to hang out with friends and family and enjoy the outdoors!', 'We also offer furniture rentals at your convenience.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Ideal Location', 'Resort-Style Amenities', 'Gazebo Covered Spa', 'Refrigerators', 'Fitness Center', 'Electric Stovetops', 'On-Site Laundry Rooms', 'Vending Machines', 'Gated Parking', 'Microwave Ovens', 'Beach Volleyball Court', 'Furnished Apartments Available', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
